Mon: I was going to give you a nasty look, but I see you already have one.
Tue: I'm no cactus expert, but I know a prick when I see one.
Wed: You look like you just ran a hundred yard dash in a ninety yard gym.
Fri: Save your breath, you'll need to to blow up your girlfriend later.
Sat: If laughter is the best medicine, your face must be curing the world.
Sun: It's better to let someone think you are an Idiot than to open your mouth and prove it.
Sun2: Brains aren't everything. In your case they're nothing.
Sun4: You, sir, are an oxygen thief!
Fri4: Don't like my sarcasm, well I don't like your stupid.
Tue6: Please shut your mouth when you’re talking to me.
Mon8: They say opposites attract. I hope you meet someone who is good-looking, intelligent, and cultured.
Sat10: If your gonna be two faced, honey at least make one of them pretty.
summer_1: I don't know what to cook for myself today.
summer_Mon: How old are you? - Wait I shouldn't ask, you can't count that high.
summer_Tue: Have you been shopping lately? They're selling lives, you should go get one.
summer_Wed: You're like Monday mornings, nobody likes you.
summer_Thu: Of course I talk like an idiot, how else would you understand me?
summer_Fri: My friend thinks he is smart. He told me an onion is the only food that makes you cry, so I threw a coconut at his face.
summer_Sat: Your house is so dirty you have to wipe your feet before you go outside.
summer_Sun: If you really spoke your mind, you'd be speechless.
summer_Sun4: If I told you that I have a piece of dirt in my eye, would you move?
summer_Thu4: So, a thought crossed your mind? Must have been a long and lonely journey.
summer_Mon4: Keep talking, someday you'll say something intelligent!
summer_Fri6: Don't you have a terribly empty feeling - in your skull?
summer_Wed8: We can always tell when you are lying. Your lips move.
summer_Sat10: Are you always this stupid or is today a special occasion?
fall_1: Go ahead and tell me everything you know. I've got a spare ten seconds.
fall_Mon: You don't need some beauty sleep, you need to hibernate.
fall_Wed: You remind me of myself. Back when I was young and stupid.
fall_Fri: Your lips are moving, but all I hear is “blah, blah, blah.”
fall_Sat: The kids in town are way smarter than you.
fall_Sun: #18 You’ll go far someday. Hopefully, you’ll stay there.
fall_Fri6: Don’t let your mind wander. It’s too small to be out there all alone.
fall_Mon4: So, you changed your mind? Does the new one work any better?
fall_Wed8: Hide! The garbage truck is coming!
fall_Thu10: I’m a little busy right now, but I’d love the chance to ignore you some other time.
winter_1: You should really come with a warning label.
winter_Mon: If you want me to accept you as you are, I’m going to have to lie to myself about liking you.
winter_Tue: Aww…it’s so cute when you talk about things you don’t understand.
I suggest you do a little soul searching. You might just find one.
winter_Wed: You look tired. Have you been thinking?
winter_Thu: You are about as interesting as a documentary on dirt.
winter_Fri: I’d punch you in the face, but the thought of touching your face disgusts me.
winter_Sat: Why am I so rude? I just don't like city folk like you.
winter_Sun: I don’t know how you do it, but after a shower, you look even greasier.
winter_Fri4: I’d sue my parents if I had a face like yours.Oh I just love it here, I should visit more often!
winter_Sat6: Why is it OK for you to be an idiot, but not OK for me to point it out?
winter_Tue4: It looks like your face caught fire and someone tried to put it out with a baseball bat.
If I threw a stick, you’d leave, right?
winter_Wed8: You have the right to remain silent because whatever you say will probably be stupid anyway.
winter_Thu6: The village called. They’d like their idiot back. You better get going.
